languages.text: {n}Перед вами на коленях нескладный мужчина с упрямой челюстью и тяжелым взглядом. На фоне прочих работников отсека он ничем не примечателен, кроме татуировки на предплечье с червем, пожирающим звезду.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Перед вами на коленях нескладный мужчина с упрямой челюстью и тяжелым взглядом. На фоне прочих работников отсека он ничем не примечателен, кроме татуировки на предплечье с червем, пожирающим звезду.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The man kneeling before you has an ungainly build, a stubborn jaw, and a heavy gaze. He looks no different from any other worker in this compartment, except for the tattoo on his forearm, its design resembling a worm devouring a star.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Перед вами на коленях нескладный мужчина с упрямой челюстью и тяжелым взглядом. На фоне прочих работников отсека он ничем не примечателен, кроме татуировки на предплечье с червем, пожирающим звезду.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The man kneeling before you has an ungainly build, a stubborn jaw, and a heavy gaze. He looks no different from any other worker in this compartment, except for two things: the first is a tattoo on his forearm, its design resembling a worm devouring a star.{/n}

{n}The man standing on his knees before your has an ungainly build, a stubborn jaw, and a heavy gaze. He looks no different from any other worker you have seen in this compartment, with two exceptions. The first is a fresh tattoo on his forearm, its design resembling a worm devouring a star. The second is a barely visible mark at the base of his neck — either a bite mark that has almost healed or, perhaps, a burn.{/n}

{n}The man kneeling before you has an ungainly build, a stubborn jaw, and a heavy gaze. He looks no different from any other worker in this compartment, except for two things: the first is a tattoo on his forearm, its design resembling a worm devouring a star.{/n}

{n}The man standing on his knees before your has an ungainly build, a stubborn jaw, and a heavy gaze. The second is a barely visible mark at the base of his neck — either a bite mark that has almost healed or, perhaps, a burn.{/n}

{n}The man kneeling before you has an ungainly build, a stubborn jaw, and a heavy gaze. languages.text: {n}El hombre arrodillado ante ti es de complexión desgarbada, mandíbula terca y mirada pesada. A primera vista, parece un trabajador cualquiera de este compartimento excepto por el tatuaje de su antebrazo, con un diseño similar a un gusano devorando una estrella.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The man kneeling before you has an ungainly build, a stubborn jaw, and a heavy gaze. He looks no different from any other worker in this compartment, except for the tattoo on his forearm, its design resembling a worm devouring a star.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El hombre arrodillado ante ti es de complexión desgarbada, mandíbula terca y mirada pesada. A primera vista, parece un trabajador cualquiera de este compartimento excepto por el tatuaje de su antebrazo, con un diseño similar a un gusano devorando una estrella.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたの前にひざまずいている男は、不格好な体格で、頑固なあご、重いまなざしをしている。この区にいる他の労働者と大差はない。前腕に星を食い荒らすミミズのような刺青がある以外は。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The man kneeling before you has an ungainly build, a stubborn jaw, and a heavy gaze. He looks no different from any other worker in this compartment, except for the tattoo on his forearm, its design resembling a worm devouring a star.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの前にひざまずいている男は、不格好な体格で、頑固なあご、重いまなざしをしている。この区にいる他の労働者と大差はない。前腕に星を食い荒らすミミズのような刺青がある以外は。{/n}

languages.text: {n}一个面相粗笨的人跪在你面前，下巴紧绷，目光沉重。他看起来和船舱里其他工人没有任何区别，但有他的小臂上纹着一个新的纹身，图案像是一条虫子在吞噬一颗星星。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The man kneeling before you has an ungainly build, a stubborn jaw, and a heavy gaze. He looks no different from any other worker in this compartment, except for the tattoo on his forearm, its design resembling a worm devouring a star.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一个面相粗笨的人跪在你面前，下巴紧绷，目光沉重。他看起来和船舱里其他工人没有任何区别，但有他的小臂上纹着一个新的纹身，图案像是一条虫子在吞噬一颗星星。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Mann, der vor dir kniet, hat einen gedrungenen Körper, einen störrischen Kiefer und einen trägen Blick. Er unterscheidet sich von den anderen Arbeitern in diesem Modul nur durch die Tätowierung auf seinem Unterarm. Sie zeigt einen Wurm, der einen Stern verschlingt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The man kneeling before you has an ungainly build, a stubborn jaw, and a heavy gaze. He looks no different from any other worker in this compartment, except for the tattoo on his forearm, its design resembling a worm devouring a star.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Mann, der vor dir kniet, hat einen gedrungenen Körper, einen störrischen Kiefer und einen trägen Blick. Er unterscheidet sich von den anderen Arbeitern in diesem Modul nur durch die Tätowierung auf seinem Unterarm. Sie zeigt einen Wurm, der einen Stern verschlingt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'homme agenouillé devant vous accuse une allure disgracieuse, une mâchoire butée et un regard lourd. Il ressemble en tout point aux autres ouvriers de ce compartiment, à l'exception du tatouage sur son avant-bras, dont le dessin représente un ver en train de dévorer une étoile.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The man kneeling before you has an ungainly build, a stubborn jaw, and a heavy gaze. He looks no different from any other worker in this compartment, except for the tattoo on his forearm, its design resembling a worm devouring a star.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'homme agenouillé devant vous accuse une allure disgracieuse, une mâchoire butée et un regard lourd. Il ressemble en tout point aux autres ouvriers de ce compartiment, à l'exception du tatouage sur son avant-bras, dont le dessin représente un ver en train de dévorer une étoile.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Önünde eğilen adamın hantal bir yapısı, sert bir çenesi ve ağır bir bakışı var. Alnındaki bir yıldız yutan solucanı andırırcasına tasarlanmış dövmesi hariç görünüşte bu kompartımandaki diğer işçilerden hiçbir farkı yok.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The man kneeling before you has an ungainly build, a stubborn jaw, and a heavy gaze. He looks no different from any other worker in this compartment, except for the tattoo on his forearm, its design resembling a worm devouring a star.{/n}
